snippet.title: Bloodborne The Old Hunters  - Expansion DLC Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
http://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/bloodborne-ps4

"The Old Hunters" is a brand new expansion DLC for the critically acclaimed PlayStation®4 exclusive Bloodborne, available for download starting November 24, 2015.

Experience the nightmare of the hunters who once guarded Byrgenwerth’s deepest, darkest secrets and uncover the mystery behind Yharnam’s sinister past and in The Old Hunters expansion DLC for Bloodborne™. Journey to a world where hunters from the past are trapped forever, find multiple new outfits and weapons to add to your hunter arsenal, and explore brand new stages full of dangers, rewards, and deadly beasts to hunt.  

Learn more at: http://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/bloodborne-ps4 

Rated Mature: Blood and Gore, Violence

©2015 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.  Bloodborne is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
